meanings.definition: Thiazides: a class of drugs used to treat high blood pressure and edema.
meanings.sent1: Doctors often prescribe thiazides to patients with high blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother takes thiazides every day to help with her swelling.
meanings.sent3: The thiazides danced around in the medicine cabinet, ready to lower blood pressure.
meanings.sent4: The thiazides acted like little warriors, fighting against high blood pressure.
meanings.sent5: Taking thiazides is like having a tiny army inside you, battling against edema.

meanings.definition: Thiazides: a type of diuretic that works by inhibiting sodium reabsorption in the kidneys.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended thiazides to reduce the amount of sodium in my body.
meanings.sent2: Thiazides help the kidneys get rid of excess salt through urine.
meanings.sent3: The thiazides in my system decided to throw a sodium party and flush it all out.
meanings.sent4: My kidneys thanked the thiazides for keeping the sodium levels in check.
meanings.sent5: Using thiazides is like having tiny sodium bouncers in your kidneys, kicking out the excess salt.
